
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.

add_subdirectory(lib)
add_executable(catboost-libs-data-ut)


target_include_directories(catboost-libs-data-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data
)

target_link_libraries(catboost-libs-data-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  catboost-libs-data
  catboost-libs-cat_feature
  data-ut-lib
  private-libs-index_range
  libs-gpu_config-interface
  libs-gpu_config-maybe_have_cuda
  private-libs-quantization
)

target_link_options(catboost-libs-data-ut PRIVATE
  -Wl,-platform_version,macos,11.0,11.0
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
)

target_sources(catboost-libs-data-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/borders_io_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/columns_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/ctrs_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/data_provider_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/external_columns_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/features_layout_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/load_data_from_dsv_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/load_data_from_libsvm_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/meta_info_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/model_dataset_compatibility_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/objects_grouping_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/objects_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/order_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/process_data_blocks_from_dsv_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/quantization_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/target_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/unaligned_mem_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/util.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/data/ut/weights_ut.cpp
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  catboost-libs-data-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  catboost-libs-data-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  catboost-libs-data-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  catboost-libs-data-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  SMALL
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  catboost-libs-data-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  catboost-libs-data-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)


target_allocator(catboost-libs-data-ut
  system_allocator
)

vcs_info(catboost-libs-data-ut)
